name: Hit Knock & Toss
description:
If you like challenging mini games then get ready to be amazed by Hit Knock & Toss an addictive carnival game for all ages. Forget about Simulation, Action, Parking, Shooting and Puzzle type games!

In Hit Knock & Toss you can challenge your aim, hone your precision, and push your puzzle-solving skills to the next level in this insanely addictive game. Improve your weaknesses while aiming and throwing balls at piles of cans and beer bottles in this improved & polished all time classic Can Knock Down.

Unlock other hit & knockdown modes where you’ll face different puzzle game challenges which will keep you playing all night long. Enjoy excellent graphics, addictive gameplay, carnival themed backgrounds everything you need in this amazing can knock down game.

Hit And Knock is the most relaxing carnival game! Enter the world of carnival games introduced to you by our friendly clown, with a variety of modes for you like, Can Knockdown, Ring Toss & Down the Clown. Throw your ball to knock down the cans, shoot and land rings in bottles, and hit the crazy clowns. Crush your friends by beating their high scores in this 3D addicting game to become the star of this action packed Hit and Knock game of 2018.

Featuring fun upgrades of balls & rings with up to 6 different balls! You need to collect them all to throw at cans, sandbags, and even evil clowns to win this carnival challenge. Tossing the rings at bottles will keep you engaged for hours in this most relaxing & awesome addicting game! With different carnival based backgrounds. Hit and Knock is your go-to games for super fun carnival 2018 games.

So what are you waiting for hit, smash, toss & crush in 2018’s best Hit Knock & Toss Shooter Mania Game.

Game Features:
- Gorgeous Carnival game type 3D graphics
- Multiple challenging levels in beautiful 3D locations!
- Unlock New Game modes & discover hidden secrets! 
- Show off your skills & challenge your friends! 
- Multiple Knock Hit & Toss Game achievements!
- Challenging modes from Easy to Tricky, can you clear them all?
